name: markopolis
description: Markopolis is a self-hosted platform for highlighting and annotating text on any web page. It stores highlights, tags quotes, and allows access later through a searchable UI ideal for research or note-taking.

features.title: Web Highlighting
features.description: Select and highlight text on any webpage for later reference and review

features.title: Annotation System
features.description: Add notes and comments to highlighted passages for context and analysis

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Categorize highlights with custom tags for research topics or projects

features.title: Search Interface
features.description: Find specific highlights across all saved pages using full-text search

features.title: Browser Extension
features.description: Capture highlights directly from your browser without switching apps

features.title: Quote Extraction
features.description: Automatically extract and format highlighted text as quotations

features.title: Source Tracking
features.description: Maintain links to original pages and capture metadata like author and date

features.title: Collection Management
features.description: Group related highlights into collections for different research projects
